Package org.forgerock.openidm.shell.impl

Class UpdateCommandConfig

java.lang.Object
org.forgerock.openidm.shell.impl.UpdateCommandConfig
public class UpdateCommandConfig extends Object
Value bean to hold the provided command line input parameters, and config data, provided to the update command.

    Description

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    long
    getCheckCompleteFrequency()
    Returns the time between checks for a finished status of an install call.
    long
    getCheckJobsRunningFrequency()
    Returns the time between calls to lookup the current list of running jobs.
    String
    getLogFilePath()
    Returns the file path to the log file that will be appended to with the update log information.
    long
    getMaxJobsFinishWaitTimeMs()
    Returns the Maximum time the update command should wait for all jobs to complete in the scheduler.
    long
    getMaxUpdateWaitTimeMs()
    Returns the Maximum time the update command should wait for the installation of the archive to take.
    String
    getUpdateArchive()
    Returns the name of the update archive expected to be in the bin/update directory.

    Returns true if the license was accepted via the input parameters of the command line.

    Returns if the command output is quite; ie the log output is only written to the file and not to the console.

    • isAcceptedLicense

      public boolean isAcceptedLicense()
      Returns true if the license was accepted via the input parameters of the command line.
      Returns:
      true if the license was accepted via the input parameters of the command line.

    • setAcceptedLicense

      public UpdateCommandConfig setAcceptedLicense(boolean acceptedLicense)
      Sets if the license was accepted via the input parameters of the command line. If true the process will skip requesting the license content and asking for keyboard input to accept the license.
      Parameters:
      acceptedLicense - true if the license is accepted via the input parameters of the command line.
      Returns:
      this config instance

    • isSkipRepoUpdatePreview

      public boolean isSkipRepoUpdatePreview()
      Returns true if a preview of repository updates was bypassed via the input parameters of the command line.
      Returns:
      true if a preview of repository updates was bypassed via the input parameters of the command line.

    • setSkipRepoUpdatePreview

      public UpdateCommandConfig setSkipRepoUpdatePreview(boolean skipRepoUpdatePreview)
      Sets if a preview of repository updates was bypassed via the input parameters of the command line. Suitable if user has already downloaded and approved changes to his/her repository. If true the process will skip a preview and storing of repository updates.
      Parameters:
      skipRepoUpdatePreview - true if a preview of repository updates was bypassed via the input parameters of the command line.
      Returns:
      this config instance

      public boolean isQuietMode()

      if the command output is quite.
